text: Barbara Perry (June 22, 1921 â€“ May 5, 2019) was an American actress, singer and dancer. She was born in Norfolk, Virginia. Perry was known for her television roles in The Donna Reed Show, The Andy Griffith Show, My Three Sons, and The Dick Van Dyke Show, where she played Buddy Sorrell's wife Pickles, before being replaced by Joan Shawlee. She also played Thelma Brockwood on The Hathaways. Perry's last known role was in the television series Baskets.
